extendedInfo.description: Don't  you  get  tired  of  reading  about  all  the  bad  things  happening  in  the  world. I  stopped  reading  the  paper  and  listening  to  the  news  because  everyday it  was  the  same  thing.  What  would  happen  if  we  started  putting  good  thing  out  there  for  everyone to  read  about,  maybe  it  would  catch  on  and  people  would  learn  from  example.  So  if  you  have  a  good  personal  story  or  just  found  out  some  good  news  that  might make  others  think  about  thier  lives  POST  IT  HERE  Lets  see  if  we  can  make  "GOOD  NEWS"  addicting.

reviews.title: Hello?
reviews.comment: Is this app bring maintained? There\'s hardly anything on here and I was excited when I found it....
reviews.author: A Google User
